column5: Anyone on or near Longbow? We are headed up to Redden's in 3 weeks. How are things looking? Water levels, fishing, etc. Last time up that way was over on Blindfold Lake in 2014 so i am expecting much of the same i would assume.

I fished out of Redden's in 1958, interesting portage rig into LOW. I understand Blindfold has crappie in it, never hear anything on the lake, camp closes (to me) early in the fall, was interested in trying it at one time. Bill
